org.diet4j.core

Class ModuleRequirement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diet4j.core.ModuleRequirement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ModuleRequirement
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This collects all information needed to find a Module.
    See Also:
